quote: God created… light anddark, heaven and hell—science claims the same thing as religion, that the Big Bang createdeverything in the universe with an opposite.“Including matter itself, antimatter
quote_letters: GOD CREATED LIGHT ANDDARK HEAVEN AND HELL-SCIENCE CLAIMS THE SAME THING AS RELIGION THAT THE BIG BANG CREATEDEVERYTHING IN THE UNIVERSE WITH AN OPPOSITEINCLUDING MATTER ITSELF ANTIMATTER
